title: ŠAMPON GINGER&FOREST HONEY BOTANIC THERAPY, GARNIER, 400ML

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA / WATER, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCO-BETAINE, GLYCERIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE ROOT EXTRACT / GINGER ROOT EXTRACT, MEL / HONEY, PPG-5-CETETH-20, PEG-55 PROPYLENE GLYCOL OLEATE, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, SORBITOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR HYDROXYPROPY-LTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, CITRIC ACID, OLEYL ALCOHOL, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, TOCOPHEROL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SALICYLIC ACID, CI 14700 / RED 4, CARAMEL, CI 19140 / YELLOW 5, EUGENOL, COUMARIN, LIMONENE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE.
